title: r/Choosingbeggars YOUR BUSINESS CHARGES MONEY?!?
description:
r/Choosingbeggars This woman is absolutely SHOCKED that a business expects money in exchange for goods. What kind of terrible business actually charges money? Are they monsters or something? The choosing beggar then goes on an angry rant about how she's only willing to pay $1, and the business should be GRATEFUL for that $1. If you like this video and want to see more, hit that subscribe button for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hKhbk7Nqsgo
